name: SQUISH (itch)
description:
A small game by @retr0verse

Squish your friends?
Who gets to do that?
YOU!

Its Head on Head *Ha* action as you battle it out and let your colours stain the battlefield. First to five Wins!


Features:

  • Fast couch fun for 2 or 4 people.
  • Full controller support.
  • made as a 4 hour game jam.
